title: CTRL0000071071 - Transcribed Interview of Philip Luelsdorff, (April 18, 2022)

data.text: JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL,
The deposition in the above matter was held via Webex, commencing at 2:02 p.m.
For the SELECT COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE
THE JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL:
We'll go on the record at 2:01 p.m.
deposition of Philip Luelsdorff conducted by the House Select Committee to Investigate
the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol, pursuant to House Resolution 503.
Mr. Luelsdorff, can you please state your full name and spell your name for the
At this time, Mr. Luelsdorff, can you please raise your right hand
to be sworn by the official reporter.
Do you solemnly declare and affirm under the penalty of perjury
that the testimony you are about to give will be the truth, the whole truth, and nothing
This will be a staff-led deposition
today, although members of the select committee may choose to ask questions.
select committee staff joining me today are
I'm an investigative counsel with the committee.
There are currently no members of the select committee in attendance, and I will

deposition rules are included in this exhibit and were provided to you upon service of the
Under the House deposition rules, you are permitted to have an attorney present.
And, at this time, can counsel for the witness please state her full name.
My name is Leslie McAdoo Gordon.
I am licensed to practice law in the District of Columbia, the State of

Again, I am Leslie McAdoo Gordon.

unlawful to deliberately provide false information to Congress.
information to Congress could result in criminal penalties, including both perjury and/or

or a privilege assertion, I'll ask that you or your counsel state it for the record.
to clarify the basis for each objection.

reporter can't record nonverbal responses, such as shaking your head.
that you answer each question with an audible, verbal response.
For the benefit of the reporter and for the record, there may be times where I

We ask that you provide complete answers based off of your best recollection.
the question is not clear, please ask for clarification.
